page.title: 10HORSE RIDING
page.content: I don't get to go horse riding very often so when I do get to go I'm very excited. I only get to go when I7m at my aunties. I get into the van and drive off. It's about 5 minutes ride to the stables and when I get there I usually have to wait another half an hour but I usually find something to do at the stables. Grooming a horse or mucking them out or even feeding the bull! Finally I get going. I always have to cross a main road before I get to the lane. I sometimes trot and when I get to the woods I canter. If I'm feeling really brave I get my horse to jump over a fallen tree stump.
